https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wZjegy3uBwSuMA78pUfLUTzDDzM.jpg Highlights the plight of young children employed in the fireworks industry. Their childhood is lost in the dark factories with no basic amenities even. Children of Mini-Japan
